original_text: They are to be treated as workers hired from year to year; you must see to it that those to whom they owe service do not rule over them ruthlessly.
korean_text: 주인은 그를 매년의 삯꾼과 같이 여기고 네 목전에서 엄하게 부리지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: They are to be treated as workers hired from year to year
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 일년 단위로 고용된 일꾼으로 대우받아야 하며

sentences.original_text: that those to whom they owe service
do not rule over them ruthlessly
